results.title: Role of Metformin in Preeclampsia: A Systematic Review.
results.text_hl: Role of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Pre_Eclampsia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011225 @@@Preeclampsia@@@: A Systematic Review.

results.title: Effects of Different Glucose-Lowering Measures on Maternal and Infant Outcomes in Pregnant Women with Gestational Diabetes: A Network Meta-analysis
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Pre_Eclampsia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011225 @@@Preeclampsia@@@ incidence in the diet and exercise groups was significantly lower than in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (0.19, 95% CI 0.043-0.72) and @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ (0.15, 95% CI 0.032-0.52) groups.

citations.NLM: Ouyang H, Wu N. Effects of Different Glucose-Lowering Measures on Maternal and Infant Outcomes in Pregnant Women with Gestational Diabetes: A Network Meta-analysis Diabetes Ther. 2021 Oct;12(10):2715-2753. PMID: 34482529

results.title: The effects of metformin on inflammation and apoptosis in rats with preeclampsia.
results.text_hl: Our results indicate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ has huge therapeutic potential against @<m>DISEASE_Pre_Eclampsia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011225 @@@PE@@@.

results.title: Challenges in Conducting Clinical Trials for Preeclampsia.
results.text_hl: Several medications, including @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Esomeprazole @CHEMICAL_MESH:D064098 @@@esomeprazole@@@, which are commonly used in non-pregnant populations, are now being investigated for @<m>DISEASE_Pre_Eclampsia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011225 @@@preeclampsia@@@ prevention.

citations.NLM: Bank TC, Kline D, Costantine MM. Challenges in Conducting Clinical Trials for Preeclampsia. Curr Hypertens Rep. 2023 Nov 16;():. PMID: 37971596
citations.BibTeX: @article{37971596, title={Challenges in Conducting Clinical Trials for Preeclampsia.}, author={Bank TC and Kline D and Costantine MM}, journal={Curr Hypertens Rep}}

results.title: Systematic evaluation of the pre-eclampsia drugs, dietary supplements and biologicals pipeline using target product profiles
results.text_hl: A trial of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in 414 pregnant @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with a high risk of @<m>DISEASE_Pre_Eclampsia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011225 @@@pre-eclampsia@@@ in Qatar has been registered.

results.title: Novel Interventions for the Prevention of Preeclampsia.
results.text_hl: The use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has also gained popularity in experimental studies, but observations from randomized clinical trials were not consistent on its utility as a possible intervention for @<m>DISEASE_Pre_Eclampsia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011225 @@@preeclampsia@@@ prevention.

citations.NLM: Ma'ayeh M, Rood KM, Kniss D, Costantine MM. Novel Interventions for the Prevention of Preeclampsia. Curr Hypertens Rep. 2020 Feb 12;22(2):17. PMID: 32052203

results.title: Pregnancy, perinatal and childhood outcomes in women with and without polycystic ovary syndrome and metformin during pregnancy: a nationwide population-based study
results.text_hl: To evaluate the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Pre_Eclampsia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011225 @@@preeclampsia@@@ and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Gestational @DISEASE_MESH:D016640 @@@gestational diabetes@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-exposure was defined as >= one prescription before week 24.
